nuskhe.title: Ajwain Water
nuskhe.description: Boil 1 teaspoon of carom seeds (ajwain) in water and drink on an empty stomach. Helps reduce period cramps and bloating.
instructions: Boil 1 teaspoon of ajwain seeds in a cup of water for 5 minutes.
Strain the water and let it cool slightly.
Drink it warm on an empty stomach.

nuskhe.title: Methi Seed Water
nuskhe.description: Soak 1 teaspoon fenugreek (methi) seeds overnight and drink the water in the morning. Helps balance hormones and reduce inflammation.
instructions: Soak 1 teaspoon of methi seeds in a cup of water overnight.
Strain the water and drink it in the morning.

nuskhe.title: Ginger Tea
nuskhe.description: Ginger tea helps in reducing menstrual pain and inflammation. It also aids digestion and boosts immunity.

nuskhe.title: Turmeric Milk
nuskhe.description: Turmeric milk is known for its anti-inflammatory properties and helps relieve period cramps.
instructions: Stir well and drink before bedtime.

nuskhe.title: Cumin Water
nuskhe.description: Cumin water aids digestion and relieves bloating and cramps during menstruation.
instructions: Soak 1 teaspoon of cumin seeds in water overnight.
Strain and drink the water in the morning.

nuskhe.title: Fennel Seed Water
nuskhe.description: Fennel seed water helps regulate periods and relieves bloating.
instructions: Soak 1 teaspoon of fennel seeds in a cup of water overnight.
Strain and drink in the morning.

nuskhe.title: Aloe Vera Juice
nuskhe.description: Aloe vera juice helps balance hormones and improve digestion.
instructions: Blend with water and drink fresh.
